scripts.postinstall:
printf "yarn init:project - fully build the project, this is slow and only needs to run once
yarn build:editor - update the swagger editor page with the latest local swagger doc
yarn start - serve the project on port 1337
yarn http-server . 0000 - replace 0000 with the port of your choice

"
scripts.init:project: yarn fetch:plugin && yarn install:plugin && yarn build:editor
scripts.fetch:plugin: node -e '!require("fs").existsSync("plugin/swagger-editor") && function(){console.log("cloning swagger editor"); console.log(require("child_process").execSync("git clone git@github.com:swagger-api/swagger-editor.git plugin/swagger-editor/").output); return true;}() || console.log("swagger editor exists, skipping clone");'
scripts.build:editor: yarn set:swagger && cd plugin/swagger-editor && npm run build && yarn copy:editor
scripts.copy:editor: cp plugin/swagger-editor/index.html src/editor && cp -r plugin/swagger-editor/dist src/editor/dist
